paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Specifically, KCNH2 Arg176Trp and SCN5A Pro1090Leu were identified once in SUDEP cases and absent in control alleles.

functional_data.summary: Variant previously identified in the pathogenesis of LQTS.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on previous reports
variants.additional_notes: Variant identified in the context of SUDEP.
key_quotes: Genetic analysis revealed 6 (13%) non‐synonymous (amino acid changing) variants in KCNH2 (n = 2) and SCN5A (n = 4), all previously reported in LQTS patients.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data extracted from the main text with no supplementary tables available.
